content: lisbeth shawl one size pictured shawl is 132 cm/52 inches long and 28 cm/11 inches wide it can easily be modified it can be made longer by just keeping on knitting the lace row until you have the desired length or wider by adding more repeats of the chart adding 14 stitches to the number of stitches you cast on for each extra intended repeat 1 you need yarn light fingering 150 grams/540 metres used in pictures mondial emozione fine merino needles 3 5 mm 80 cm stitch markers tapestry needle get started cast on 76 stitches knit 5 row start working the lace pattern and place markers as you knit this first lace row follow written instructions below or go to the chart on page 4 the chart shows the *-* stitches if you follow the chart you knit each row as follows slip 1 s k2 chart x 5 k3 all chart symbols explained below the chart note that there are instructions to follow on rs and ws row 1 -
